title: Spike Tiller
text: Spike Tiller enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it., Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Tiller: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature., Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Tiller: Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
